Text: Future Terminations Cc Hello to all In an effort to maintain correct data and effectively handle transitions please notify your appropriate HR Rep of any known future terminations that may happen within the next days These terminations should include both Voluntary and Involuntary terms Please let me know if there are any questions Thank you Sonja Galloway Frank De Jesus HR Rep Public Affairs Risk Assessment Control Government Affairs Terry Bosien HR Rep Corporate Secretary Corporate Legal Credit Union Valeria Hope HR Rep Human Resources
